constraints.name: capacity_constraint
constraints.description: 选取元素权重和不超过容量上限（总交集长度需达到或超过 k）

constraints.name: interval_extension
constraints.description: 区间可以向左或向右扩展一个单位长度
constraints.formal: transform [x, y] to [x-1, y] or [x, y+1]

constraints.name: initial_intervals_equal
constraints.description: 初始时，所有区间的值相同
